allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Command Center with ElevenLabs voice integration

- Multi-agent chat interface with Claude AI
- ElevenLabs TTS voice synthesis for agent responses
- JWT authentication system
- SQLite database for chat history
- Real-time messaging via Socket.IO
- Deploy script for production server

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update deploy script with SSH option and better error handling

- Added -UseSSH flag for SCP-based deployment
- Better error messages with deployment alternatives
- Added -User parameter for flexibility

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
